title: Cycling Plus December issue on sale now! Subscribe and receive a free Altura Nevis jacket worth £64.99
content:
The latest Cycling Plus comes complete with a 28-page Science of Cycling guide packed with cutting edge innovation, training ideas and nutrition to get your 2022 season off to a flyer.

In the main magazine’s unrivalled bike tests, we run the rule over the cheaper versions of superbikes from Colnago and Specialized, and look at the pros and cons of gravel machines from Whyte with 1x and 2x chainsets.

Plus, if you subscribe to Cycling Plus you’ll receive a free Altura Nevis jackets worth £64.99

New gear

Our Upgrade section includes a buyer’s guide to sub-£100 helmets, plus we take a look at Swiss Side’s formidable Hadron wheels, bike computer mounts from £15, gravel clothing, reflective jackets and much more.

In the further bike tests, we have first rides of the Giant Revolt Advanced 1, 3T Exploro Racemax Boost and Vitus Zenium CRS Ultegra Di2.

In-depth features

As for features, we discover the habits of winning cyclists, face the challenge of British cycling’s most notorious sportive, the Fred Whitton Challenge, and uncover 15 ways why you should join a bike club today.

Big Ride: Geneva to Florence

In the Big Ride spot, Rob Ainsley fulfils a 2020 wish to ride from Geneva to Florence… well, sort of. This is the less exotic Geneva in West Wales to Florence near Stoke-on-Trent.

In our Training Zone section, we look at the latest generation of smart helmets, offer the best DIY energy bar recipes and provide proven ways to get into cyclocross this season.

Science of Cycling guide

We’ve got a supplement, too, The Science of Cycling, packed with cutting edge innovation, training ideas and nutrition to get your 2022 season off to a flyer.

Subscription offer

Subscribe to Cycling Plus magazine today and you’ll get a Altura Nevis jacket worth £64.99 – perfect for winter.

Whether you’re looking at investing in a new bike, trying a different kind of cycling or searching for new gear to make those days on the road more comfortable, Cycling Plus is the magazine for you.

You’ll find inspiring features from across the UK and around the world on every page, plus interviews with the movers and shakers in cycling.

Remember, subscribe today and you’ll receive a free Altura cycling jacket. You’ll also save 30% on the shop price.

Otherwise, check out the Cycling Plus Facebook, Instagram and Twitter accounts for all of the latest news from the magazine team.
